diseases.name: Common Cold
diseases.description: Viral infection of the upper respiratory tract
diseases.treatment: Rest, fluids, over-the-counter medications for symptom relief
diseases.urgency: Self-care, see doctor if symptoms worsen or persist beyond 10 days

diseases.name: Influenza (Flu)
diseases.description: Viral infection affecting the respiratory system
diseases.treatment: Rest, fluids, antiviral medications if started early
diseases.urgency: See doctor within 48 hours for antiviral treatment

diseases.name: Gastroenteritis
diseases.description: Inflammation of stomach and intestines
diseases.treatment: Hydration, rest, bland diet, probiotics
diseases.urgency: See doctor if severe dehydration or symptoms persist beyond 3 days

diseases.name: Migraine
diseases.description: Severe headache disorder with neurological symptoms
diseases.treatment: Pain medications, rest in dark room, trigger avoidance
diseases.urgency: See doctor for severe or frequent migraines

diseases.name: Allergic Reaction
diseases.description: Immune system response to allergens
diseases.treatment: Antihistamines, avoid allergens, topical treatments
diseases.urgency: Seek immediate care for severe reactions (difficulty breathing)

diseases.name: Anxiety Disorder
diseases.description: Mental health condition characterized by excessive worry
diseases.treatment: Therapy, relaxation techniques, medication if needed
diseases.urgency: See mental health professional for persistent symptoms

diseases.name: Depression
diseases.description: Mental health disorder affecting mood and daily functioning
diseases.treatment: Therapy, medication, lifestyle changes
diseases.urgency: Seek immediate help for suicidal thoughts

diseases.name: Hypertension
diseases.description: High blood pressure condition
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, blood pressure medications
diseases.urgency: Regular monitoring required, emergency care for severe symptoms

diseases.name: Type 2 Diabetes
diseases.description: Metabolic disorder affecting blood sugar regulation
diseases.treatment: Diet control, exercise, blood sugar monitoring, medication
diseases.urgency: Regular monitoring required, emergency care for severe symptoms

diseases.name: Urinary Tract Infection
diseases.description: Bacterial infection of the urinary system
diseases.treatment: Antibiotics, increased fluid intake
diseases.urgency: See doctor promptly to prevent kidney infection

diseases.name: Pneumonia
diseases.description: Infection causing inflammation in lung air sacs
diseases.treatment: Antibiotics, rest, oxygen therapy if needed
diseases.urgency: Seek immediate medical attention

diseases.name: Asthma
diseases.description: Chronic respiratory condition causing airway inflammation
diseases.treatment: Inhalers, avoid triggers, medication management
diseases.urgency: Emergency care for severe breathing difficulty

diseases.name: Arthritis
diseases.description: Joint inflammation causing pain and stiffness
diseases.treatment: Anti-inflammatory medications, physical therapy, exercise
diseases.urgency: See doctor for persistent joint pain

diseases.name: Fibromyalgia
diseases.description: Chronic pain disorder affecting muscles and soft tissues
diseases.treatment: Pain management, exercise, stress reduction, medication
diseases.urgency: See doctor for chronic widespread pain

diseases.name: Sinusitis
diseases.description: Inflammation of sinus cavities
diseases.treatment: Decongestants, nasal irrigation, antibiotics if bacterial
diseases.urgency: See doctor if symptoms persist beyond 10 days

diseases.name: Bronchitis
diseases.description: Inflammation of bronchial tubes
diseases.treatment: Rest, fluids, cough suppressants, bronchodilators
diseases.urgency: See doctor for persistent cough or breathing difficulty

diseases.name: Eczema
diseases.description: Chronic skin condition causing inflammation
diseases.treatment: Moisturizers, topical steroids, avoid triggers
diseases.urgency: See doctor for severe or infected eczema

diseases.name: Psoriasis
diseases.description: Autoimmune skin condition causing rapid cell turnover
diseases.treatment: Topical treatments, light therapy, systemic medications
diseases.urgency: See doctor for proper diagnosis and treatment

diseases.name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome
diseases.description: Functional gastrointestinal disorder
diseases.treatment: Dietary changes, stress management, medications
diseases.urgency: See doctor for persistent digestive symptoms

diseases.name: Acid Reflux (GERD)
diseases.description: Stomach acid flowing back into esophagus
diseases.treatment: Dietary changes, antacids, proton pump inhibitors
diseases.urgency: See doctor for frequent or severe symptoms

diseases.name: Sleep Apnea
diseases.description: Sleep disorder causing breathing interruptions
diseases.treatment: CPAP therapy, lifestyle changes, surgery if needed
diseases.urgency: See doctor for evaluation and sleep study

diseases.name: Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
diseases.description: Complex disorder characterized by extreme fatigue
diseases.treatment: Symptom management, graded exercise, cognitive therapy
diseases.urgency: See doctor for persistent unexplained fatigue

diseases.name: Thyroid Disorders
diseases.description: Conditions affecting thyroid hormone production
diseases.treatment: Hormone replacement therapy, medication adjustment
diseases.urgency: See doctor for thyroid function testing

diseases.name: Kidney Stones
diseases.description: Hard deposits formed in kidneys
diseases.treatment: Pain management, increased fluids, surgery if needed
diseases.urgency: Seek immediate care for severe pain

diseases.name: Gallstones
diseases.description: Hard deposits in gallbladder
diseases.treatment: Dietary changes, surgery if symptomatic
diseases.urgency: See doctor for severe abdominal pain

diseases.name: Anemia
diseases.description: Condition with insufficient healthy red blood cells
diseases.treatment: Iron supplements, dietary changes, treat underlying cause
diseases.urgency: See doctor for blood testing and evaluation

diseases.name: Osteoporosis
diseases.description: Bone density loss increasing fracture risk
diseases.treatment: Calcium, vitamin D, weight-bearing exercise, medications
diseases.urgency: See doctor for bone density screening

diseases.name: Vitamin D Deficiency
diseases.description: Insufficient vitamin D levels
diseases.treatment: Vitamin D supplements, sun exposure, dietary changes
diseases.urgency: See doctor for blood testing

diseases.name: Chronic Kidney Disease
diseases.description: Progressive loss of kidney function
diseases.treatment: Blood pressure control, dietary changes, dialysis if advanced
diseases.urgency: Regular monitoring required

diseases.name: Heart Disease
diseases.description: Various conditions affecting heart function
diseases.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medications, procedures as needed
diseases.urgency: Seek immediate care for chest pain or breathing difficulty
